subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Knicks rested their stars and sent a cast of backups onto the court for a victory over the Hawks on Wednesday, but Pablo Prigioni sprained his ankle in the first quarter.
snippet: The Knicks rested their stars and sent a cast of backups onto the court for a victory over the Hawks on Wednesday, but Pablo Prigioni sprained his ankle in the first quarter.
